# ChangeLog

## v4.1.8
* Fixed: NODE-4762: Enabled `keep-alive` with 20sec timeout

## v4.1.6
* Fix: iaf-ebay uses old TLSv1 downgrade instruction that needs to be removed now, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3704

## v4.1.5
* Fixed: Node JS IAF Module Using http for Staging - Container PDLC Migration, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3500

## v4.1.4
* Fixed: cookies-ebay session keys service has circular dependency on cookies via guid, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3407

## v4.1.3
* Fixed: iaf-ebay to expose getAppToken with scope, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3127

## v4.1.2
* Short vip to long vip change, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2903
## v4.1.1
* Support ASAC domain for token generation

## v4.1.0
* Added: support asac endpoint for new getAsacToken method, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2624

## v4.0.7
* Fixed: allow domain override for getAppToken and getUserToken, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2600

## v4.0.6
* Fix: authenticateToken does not return attributes coming as 3rd argument, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2493

## v4.0.5
* Prioritize ebayAppId in getToken options

## v4.0.4
* Updated LnP endpoint

## v4.0.2
* Added support to provide expiration of the token explicitly as an option as part of the fix for public user tokens in oauth-ebay module, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1596

## v4.0.1
* Use service-instruments-ebay/lib/errors instead of instruments-ebay/errors
* Fix failing test clientId is not available anymore in the options

## v4.0.0
* Remove peer and unwanted dependencies and upgrade dependencies

## 0.4.0
* Added authenticateUser method

## 0.3.12
* Fixed: passing options to getSecurityTokenByRef

## 0.3.11
* Added `force-retry` `true` as this is `POST` request

## 0.3.10
* Converted from servicecore to service-client-ebay

## 0.3.10
* Adding support for logout

## 0.3.9
* Support for adding custom attributes

## 0.3.8
* Temp: added "secureProtocol": "TLSv1_method" to https configuration to avoid issues described here: https://github.com/nodejs/node/issues/3692 - OpenSSL needs to be upgraded

## 0.3.7
* Removed unused dependencies

## 0.3.5
* Fixed cyclical dependency by switching from instrument-ebay to instrument-inc

## 0.3.5
* Upgraded dependencies

## 0.3.4
* Changed service registration name to avoid collisions with older versions

## 0.3.3
* Added Missing pre-prod env config

## 0.3.2
* Fixed dependency issues

## 0.3.1
* Added domain, accountId and userId to metadata result in authenticateToken callback

## 0.3.0
* Major refactoring to make it simpler, API consistent and overridable.
* Token validation now returns token attributes that can be used for validation
